channel.title: Typescripts on hsiaosiyuan
channel.description: Recent content in Typescripts on hsiaosiyuan

item.title: Decorator has different implementations in babel and tsc
item.description: Decorator has different implementations in babel and tsc Assuming we have below code: import { Controller, Get } from '@nestjs/common'; import { AppService } from './app.service'; @Controller() export class AppController { constructor(private readonly appService: AppService) {} @Get() getHello(): string { return this.appService.getHello(); } } for tsc with the option emitDecoratorMetadata is turned on, above code will be translated intoï¼š import { Controller, Get } from '@nestjs/common'; import { AppService } from '.
